name: Illustrated Story Creator
description:
This Agent transforms a simple story idea into a complete, richly illustrated narrative.

After expanding the story, it identifies the most compelling scenes and generates high-quality, stylistically consistent images for them using detailed prompts.The final output is a single, ready-to-read story where the generated images are seamlessly embedded within the text, bringing the tale to life.

Feel free to edit the Agent to pick a different image generation tool.
author: @@official.sep-shinkai
